snippet: Bernard Tomic retired from his first-round match at the Italian Open against Benoit Paire after less than 10 minutes Sunday due to sickness....
lead_paragraph: Bernard Tomic retired from his first-round match at the Italian Open against Benoit Paire after less than 10 minutes Sunday due to sickness.

headline.print_headline: Tomic Retires After Less Than 10 Minutes Due to Sickness
headline.main: Tomic Retires After Less Than 10 Minutes Due to Sickness
